title: How to Make Spring Rolls with Cherry Filling

steps.headline: Put sponge fingers in a bowl and crush.
Add the cherries to the sponge fingers.
Place the spring roll wrappers on a work surface.
Put 2 tablespoons of the cherry filling in the centre of each one.
Brush the edges of the wrappers with the egg white.
Fold the two opposite corners into the centre and brush the edges with egg white.
Fold in the third corner and brush the lower section with egg whites.
Fold the lower section onto the filling and press lightly.
Brush the upper section with egg white and roll up the wrap completely.
steps.description: Make sure to enclose the filling completely, or it might leak out.

steps.headline: Put the oil in a deep pan and heat the oil until it reaches 160 °C (320 °F).
Add the spring rolls and deep fry for 5 minutes or until golden.
Remove the spring rolls and drain the oil.
steps.description: Place the rolls on paper towels to absorb excess oil and serve warm.

text: Put sponge fingers in a bowl and crush.  Stone and halve the cherries.  Add the cherries to the sponge fingers.  Add the sugar and cinnamon.  Pour in the cherry liqueur.  Mix.  Place the spring roll wrappers on a work surface.  Put 2 tablespoons of the cherry filling in the centre of each one.  Brush the edges of the wrappers with the egg white.  Fold the two opposite corners into the centre and brush the edges with egg white.  Fold in the third corner and brush the lower section with egg whites.  Fold the lower section onto the filling and press lightly.  Brush the upper section with egg white and roll up the wrap completely. Make sure to enclose the filling completely, or it might leak out. Put the oil in a deep pan and heat the oil until it reaches 160 °C (320 °F).  Add the spring rolls and deep fry for 5 minutes or until golden.  Remove the spring rolls and drain the oil. Place the rolls on paper towels to absorb excess oil and serve warm.
